title: Laptops
body:
Can a Asus X553SA-BHCLN10 run lol here are the specs 

Intel Celeron N3050 2.16GHz 
Intel HD Graphics 
4GB DDR3 RAM
500GB 5400 RPM HDD
15.6 inch, 1366 x 768 pixels
Microsoft Windows Microsoft Windows 10
5 hours battery life
4.8 lbs

replies.body: That laptop should be able to run League of Legends on medium settings with little problems. It does meet or exceed all of the [minimum specifications](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements#wq1).
